data.text: FRANCE: WW1 Cross of War - Croix de Guerre (1914 - 1915), with 4 citations in total (palms, 1 bronze, 1 silver star and 1 gold (gilt) star). Each palm represents a citation at the Army level. The palms citation on this Cross is a miniature. Each bronze star denotes a citation at the level of the regiment/brigade while each silver one denotes a citation at the level of the Division. Each gold (gilt) star represents a citation at the at the Corps level - this citation is rarely seen. The medal was awarded to military personnel who demonstrated exceptional performance before the enemy. The number 1918 stands for the year of issue! A medal for exceptional gallantry. FULL SIZE WW1 1914 1918 Item 100% original - ribbon original Condition as on the photos GREAT ADDITION TO EVERY COLLECTION! Payment Method: Paypal FREE SIGNED FOR SHIPPING
